summary: PURCHASED AS USED VEHICLE WITH THE PREMIUM WARRANTY OFFERED BY DEALER.  AIR BAG LIGHT REMAINS ON, WARNING HORN DOES NOT WORK AND CRUISE CONTROL IS INOPERATIVE.  TOOK THE VEHICLE TO CHRYSLER DEALER THIS MORNING AND SEEMED TO ME THE OTHER THREE CUSTOMERS AT THE COUNTER HAD THE SAME COMPLAINT ALL ECHOED MY PROBLEM.  WHILE DISCUSSING IT ANOTHER CUSTOMER "CHIMED IN" I HAD MINE FIXED LAST WEEK- UNDER WARRANTY.  GOT CALLED 2 HOURS LATER TO INFORM ME IT NEEDED THE CLOCK SPRING REPLACED TO THE TUNE OF $227.60.  WOULD LIKE TO GET ALL OR SOME OF THIS BACK AND A WARRANTY ON REPAIR.   *AK    *NLM      **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS*763547
